articles.title: This Elite Stone Bath Mat Dries in 60 Seconds—Ditch the Terrycloth ASAP
articles.author: Janae McKenzie
articles.summary: Sutera has launched the Stone Bath Mat, made of Diatomaceous Earth. This mat is designed for quick water absorption and drying. The Sutera Stone Bath Mat provides a smooth, dry surface to step on after showering and requires minimal maintenance, needing only occasional sanding.

articles.title: Google will soon make it easier to track all your Pixel devices
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Google is preparing to launch a new feature called "Your Devices" on the Google Store website. This feature will allow users to access information about their Made by Google devices, including model information, purchase details, and warranty specifics. The Pixel 9 Pro brings a new squared-off design, the Tensor G4 chip, and new AI features and will be available starting September 4th.

articles.title: Syntheia Reports Subscription Business Has Doubled in Past 7 Days to 2,000 Subscribers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. reports that subscriptions to its Assistant NLP platform doubled to 2,000 subscribers. The company is experiencing rapid growth and increased daily subscriber acquisition for its AI platform, exceeding initial expectations and prompting a reassessment of growth projections.

articles.title: Syntheia Reports Subscription Business Has Doubled in Past 7 Days to 2,000 Subscribers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. reports increased subscriptions to its AssistantNLP platform, reaching 2,000 subscribers. The AssistantNLP service is offered in three pricing tiers: Freemium, Basic ($99.99/month), and Pro ($299.99/month), each with varying features and monthly minutes.

articles.title: Iverson: Shaping the future
articles.author: Grant Iverson
articles.summary: Grant Iverson and his brother partnered to create 'Smokey Spice', a grilling spice company.  The company aims to enhance the outdoor grilling experience while raising awareness for forest fire prevention. 'Smokey Spice' donates its profits to the United States Forest Service and local fire departments.

articles.title: This primer beats Bobbi Brown's face base – and it's £30 cheaper
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: No7 launched a new product late last year.

articles.title: BMW's New EV Architecture Improves Range, Charging, And Costs
articles.author: James Gent
articles.summary: BMW is launching its sixth-generation eDrive technology and 'Neue Klasse' EV platform. This new platform features a new 800-volt scalable battery, leading to increased efficiency, range, and faster charging. The first model to receive this platform will be the iX3, based on the 'Vision Neue Klasse SUV concept'.

articles.title: Shanghai sees launch of an 'AI Supermarket'
articles.author: Zhu Shenshen
articles.summary: Shanghai Foundation Model Innovation Center, Infinigence AI, and Shanghai INESA launched the "AI supermarket," a new AI ecosystem platform, at the Global Developer Conference (GDC) in Shanghai. The platform provides integrated AI computing and model support with features like flexible pricing models, high-quality corpora, and government subsidies.

articles.title: Learn why the Roborock Saros 10R just trumped robot vacuums everywhere
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Roborock introduces the Saros 10R, a robot vacuum-mop hybrid featuring an ultra-thin design and VertiBeam Lateral Obstacle Avoidance. The Saros 10R features an automated dock for cleaning, drying, refilling, and emptying, coupled with Intelligent Dirt Detection and heated mop water sanitization. Its intelligent navigation system allows it to avoid obstacles and efficiently clean various surfaces, offering a customizable cleaning experience via an app.

articles.title: This Dyson cordless vacuum is 50% off at Walmart right now
articles.author: Mili Godio
articles.summary: Dyson's Digital Slim Cordless Vacuum, a lightweight cordless vacuum, is currently 50% off at Walmart. It features an LCD screen, multiple cleaning modes, up to 40 minutes of battery life, and comes with three cleaning accessories. The vacuum also converts into a handheld vacuum.

articles.title: Virgin Media will give you a free 4K TV or £200 if you make a change this month
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Virgin Media offers a promotional deal that includes a Hisense 43" 4K smart TV for customers signing up for select TV or broadband bundles. Virgin has also introduced the new One Touch Switch process. Sky launched a new and improved smart TV that provides access to over 100 channels including Sky Atlantic, alongside free Netflix and Discovery+ subscriptions.

articles.title: Did Meghan Markle steal the brand name 'As Ever' from an established trademarked clothing store? Controversy erupts; users on social media call her out
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Meghan Markle is launching a new lifestyle brand named "As Ever", planned to debut in Spring 2025, which will focus on food, gardening, entertaining, and mindful living. This announcement has sparked criticism and concern as a clothing company with the same name, "As Ever", already exists since 2017.

articles.title: Amazon Prime members can save $300 on Eufy's midrange X10 Pro Omni
articles.author: Quentyn Kennemer
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Eufy X10 Pro Omni robot vacuum for $599.99 for Prime members using coupon code NewX10US. The Eufy X10 Pro Omni boasts 8,000Pa suction, mopping capabilities with oscillating brushes, AI-powered obstacle avoidance and a multifunction auto-empty / wash / fill dock.

articles.title: New procedure for the sale of medicines to be implemented
articles.author: Glenda Flores Solano
articles.summary: Apple announced the release of its Vision Pro headset, combining augmented and virtual reality. Priced at $3499, it will be available starting February 2nd. Pre-orders begin January 19th on Apple's website and stores.

articles.title: CUPCAKE ALERT!
articles.summary: A company has introduced four new cupcake flavors that are available today.

articles.title: If You Have A Small Bedroom, You Probably Need These 16 Space-Saving Products
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Sundays Cloud Bed features a soft and comfortable design and incorporates a hydraulic lift mechanism, providing ample storage beneath the mattress.

articles.title: MONDAY haircare review: We put this £5 brand to the test and here's what happened
articles.author: Clare Stephenson
articles.summary: MONDAY, a viral hair care brand, has introduced a new range of conditioning masks and leave-in conditioners priced at £5 each. The range includes the moisture leave-in conditioner, repair leave-in conditioner, the deep moisture mask, anti-frizz mask and curl restore hair mask, each featuring specific ingredients like hyaluronic acid, jojoba oil, or keratin. The products are dermatologically tested, Leaping Bunny approved, and free of sulphates and parabens, with 100% biodegradable packaging.

articles.title: Which hand blender is the best?
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: KitchenAid offers a 5-Speed Hand Blender with a rubberized grip and multiple attachments. Hamilton Beach provides a budget-friendly 2-Speed Hand Blender with a stainless steel blade. Braun's MultiQuick Hand Blender offers a bell-shaped top for blending and a TurboBoost function.

articles.title: If You Want To Be The Best Gift-Giver In Your Friend Group, These 27 Things From Nordstrom Are A Good Place To Start
articles.author: Buzz Feed Contributor
articles.summary: This article features a curated list of gift recommendations that include L'Occitane almond shower oil, Clarins Lip Comfort Oil, Longchamp Le Pliage pouch, Marshall mini wireless speaker, Aesop hand cream, Polo Ralph Lauren socks, Stanley cup, Clinique Almost Lipstick, Fishwife Tinned Seafood Co. gift set, Our Place Always Pan, Brightland Alive extra virgin olive oil, Rothy's slides, Marc Jacobs leather card case, and Jellycat puppy plushie. The listed products span across beauty, home goods, and fashion.

articles.title: The ultimate guide to using Microsoft Phone Link on your Windows PC
articles.author: Sumukh Rao
articles.summary: Microsoft's Phone Link app, preinstalled on Windows 11, enables seamless integration between smartphones (Android and iPhone) and PCs. This service allows users to mirror notifications, send texts, make calls, run phone apps, access photos, and even use an instant hotspot, streamlining workflows and reducing distractions.  Recent updates extend text messaging capabilities to iPhone users on Windows 11.

articles.title: Google has stopped selling the Chromecast with Google TV – but there's no way I'm replacing mine
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: Google has discontinued the Chromecast with Google TV, replacing it with the Google TV Streamer unveiled in August 2024. The Google TV Streamer is now the default Google TV device, priced at $99 / £99 / AU$159.

articles.title: This 'Game Changing' Shower Head Doubles As A Neck And Scalp Massager For Under $40
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: A new massaging shower head is introduced, featuring three spray modes, an on/off button, and a handheld sprayer option. Reviewers highlight its easy installation, strong water pressure, and ability to deeply clean hair, even for those with thick hair and low water pressure. The product also comes with replacement filters and mineral beads.

articles.title: I tried KFC's new spicy Zinger Double Down
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: KFC has relaunched The Zinger Double Down burger after a five-year break, now with a new spicy twist. This bunless burger includes two crispy Zinger fillets, cheese, Supercharger Mayo, and a golden hashbrown, packaged in a special box designed for holding it. The Zinger Double Down is a limited menu item.

articles.title: Nuwa launches 'Crowdbuilding' project empowering customers to help shape the development of Nuwa Pen
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Nuwa launched its Nuwa Pen, a smart pen that digitizes handwritten notes, and initiated a "Crowdbuilding" project. The initial 6000 users will provide direct feedback to refine the Nuwa Pen. The pen features three tiny cameras to capture strokes on paper, storing notes digitally in the Nuwa+ app.

articles.title: KitchenAid's colour of 2025 is smooth like butter
articles.author: Laura Severs
articles.summary: KitchenAid is launching a new color, 'Butter,' for its Artisan Series five-quart tilt-head stand mixer. This new color will be available in early February at KitchenAid.ca and later at select Canadian retailers with a manufacturer suggested retail price of $544.99.

articles.title: Amazon offering £100 off 'fantastic' dehumidifier that 'stops mould and musty smells'
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a discounted price on a dehumidifier with a carbon filter, designed to eliminate musty smells and reduce humidity. Customer reviews on Amazon highlight its effectiveness in reducing humidity and drying laundry indoors. A similar product is also available at Currys.

articles.title: I tried the new Popeyes fried chicken restaurant in Luton and here's what I thought
articles.author: News Reporter
articles.summary: Popeyes has opened a new restaurant in Luton, featuring new menu items such as the Garlic Parm Saucin' Boneless pieces. The reviewer sampled the buffalo ranch box meal with Cajun fries and a strawberry cheesecake shake, also highlighting the new Garlic Parm Saucin' Boneless pieces as a standout product. This new location represents an expansion of Popeyes' presence and the introduction of new offerings to customers.

articles.title: Lenovo's leaked new foldable OLED AI laptop looks like someone has slipped with their mouse in Photoshop
articles.author: James Bentley
articles.summary: Lenovo is showcasing the Thinkbook Flip AI, a foldable OLED display laptop, while ASUS has a similar concept with the Zenbook Duo. The Thinkbook Flip AI has a screen that doubles in size and can be flipped into different configurations, while the Zenbook Duo utilizes two screens and a separate keyboard.

articles.title: Egypt: Digital printer
articles.author: MEED
articles.summary: A company is supplying a digital printer, suggesting potential increased availability or launch of the product.

articles.title: Get a free 4K smart TV or £200 if you switch to Virgin Media before this deal ends
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering new customers a free 43" Hisense 4K smart TV or £200 off monthly bills when they sign up for select TV and broadband bundles. Virgin has also launched the new One Touch Switch process, allowing customers to switch providers without having to contact their current one.

articles.title: Get a free 4K smart TV or £200 if you switch to Virgin Media before this deal ends
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering a free 4K smart TV to new customers who sign up this month and have also launched a 'One Touch Switch' process for easier provider switching. Sky has launched an upgraded smart TV providing access to over 100 channels including Sky Atlantic, as well as complimentary Netflix and Discovery+ subscriptions.

articles.title: This Featherweight Dyson Vacuum Is 50 Percent Off Today
articles.author: Jordan McMahon
articles.summary: Dyson's Digital Slim cordless vacuum is currently half off at Walmart. The vacuum features whole-machine filtration, an LED screen, weighs 4.4 pounds, includes two tools, and has a replaceable battery.

articles.title: DBanj unveils Nasboi, Berry Tiga as CREAM Platforms brand ambassadors (PHOTOS)
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: DBanj unveiled Nasboi and Berry Tiga as brand ambassadors for CREAM Platforms. CREAM is a platform focused on talent discovery and connecting young creatives with industry professionals.

articles.title: Apple unveils a cheaper new iPhone, fans are shocked
articles.author: Fernanda Tronco
articles.summary: The content conveys the excitement surrounding the release or acquisition of new Apple products, suggesting a recent or upcoming introduction of these items to the market.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers praise £34 'life-changing' mattress topper that saves £100s on a new mattress
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: MightySoft has launched its Mattress Topper on Amazon for £33.99. Robert Dyas offers the Ezysleep 4 Inch Thick Super Soft Mattress Topper at £32.99, and The Range sells a 5cm Deep Memory Foam Mattress Topper starting at £52.99.

articles.title: I Built A Soda Generator, And Now I'm Carbonating Everything In Sight
articles.author: Aaron Hirsch
articles.summary: BuzzFeed Arcade has launched a new AI-powered soda generator. This service allows users to input any flavor and transform it into a carbonated soda concept.

articles.title: Exfoliating Gloves vs. Body Scrubs: Which One Works Better?
articles.summary: Exfoliating gloves are available at Shop Allure Beauty for ₦800, and at Shop Rhema Beauty Shop for ₦8,000. Body scrubs can be purchased at Shop TOS Nigeria for ₦12,125. These products offer exfoliation benefits and cater to different skincare needs and preferences.

articles.title: How Nivea is Using AI to Measure Creative Effectiveness
articles.author: Cydney Lee
articles.summary: Beiersdorf, focusing on its Nivea brand, partnered with CreativeX to analyze and optimize social media content. CreativeX uses AI to assess creative elements like sizing and sound quality, ensuring alignment with Nivea's guidelines. Nivea is using these insights to test social media campaigns, including global and regional ads, aiming for pre-launch checks to ensure effectiveness, and improving aspects such as call-to-action inclusion in creative text.

articles.title: 'New DIG location coming!'
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: Dig is opening a new location at 1198 21st Street, NW. The signage is already up, and menus are available. The opening date is yet to be announced.

articles.title: New Look's €25 wrap dress is incredibly flattering and it's 50% off in closing down sale
articles.author: Shauna Bannon Ward
articles.summary: New Look has launched a major sale with up to 70% off items due to store closures in Ireland. Discounts apply to clothing like the Black Floral Print Chiffon Mini Wrap Dress, originally priced at €44.99 and now available for €25, and the Bow Detail Bandeau Mini Dress, reduced from €44.99 to €20.

articles.title: 'I just moved house and found the best cordless vacuum for dust'
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: Ultenic has launched the U16 Cordless Vacuum, a compact and versatile cleaning device. This vacuum features a touchscreen, adjustable size, and a light for highlighting dust. It boasts a quick charging time and can be easily converted from a full-sized vacuum to a handheld device. The Ultenic U16 is available for purchase directly from the brand for £159 (reduced from £219) and on Amazon for £135.98 as a limited time deal.

articles.title: Seasalt Cornwall 'flattering' dress that's 'easy to dress up' now just £40
articles.author: Shania King-Soyza
articles.summary: Seasalt Cornwall is offering the Rosemullion Organic Cotton Jersey Midi Dress for £39.95, down from £69.95. The dress is made from organic cotton jersey and features a six-panel design with an abstract spot pattern. Fashion enthusiasts can enjoy this saving for a limited time on the brand's official website.

articles.title: New Charter Technologies Buys Orchestrate AI To Advance MSP Services
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: New Charter Technologies acquired Orchestrate AI Labs, an AI-integration company focused on bringing AI models into service delivery. As part of the deal, Orchestrate AI's CEO joined New Charter Technologies as Chief Innovation Officer, to spearhead the organizational and technological vision for the next evolution of the IT department. This acquisition marks a significant step in New Charter Technologies' mission to serve its clients through innovation.

articles.title: Amazon's 'life-changing' mattress topper for under £35
articles.author: Shania King-Soyza
articles.summary: MightySoft Mattress Topper is available on Amazon and ranges from £29.99 to £43.99 based on size. The topper features a quilted top layer, breathable microfibre fillings, and is hypoallergenic and machine-washable. Robert Dyas offers the Ezysleep 4 Inch Thick Super Soft Mattress Topper, and The Range sells a 5cm Deep Memory Foam Mattress Topper.

articles.title: New web browser plug-in designed by local university student helps shoppers buy Canadian
articles.author: Josh Goeree
articles.summary: Support Canadian, a new web browser plug-in, launched recently to promote Canadian products. It works by prioritizing Canadian products in Amazon search results and suggesting Canadian alternatives on American websites like Nike and Netflix. Within its first week, the plug-in has gained over 500 users.

articles.title: Use Meesho's 'Product Q&A' feature like a pro
articles.summary: Meesho app users can navigate to "My Orders" or "My Products" after logging in. Users can select a product to ask questions or request help related to that specific product.

articles.title: Want a Free Nest Doorbell and Smart Lock? ADT's New Security Deal Surprised Me
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: ADT is offering a promotion between Feb. 20 and March 12, 2025, where new customers purchasing a security system can receive free Google Nest Doorbell and Google Nest Cam, or a Google Nest Doorbell and a Yale Smart Lock. The systems must cost at least $599 for a pro-installed version or $270 for the self-installed option and work with the Trusted Neighbor features.

articles.title: Beauty entrepreneur Jaimee Lupton wants her brands to be a modern L'Oreal. Here's how she plans to get it done
articles.author: Lily McDonald
articles.summary: Jaimee Lupton and Nick Mowbray launched Monday haircare in 2020, targeting a younger demographic with personalized branding and messaging. Monday Haircare was named Brand of the Year for 2024 by Glossy and has won 21 other beauty awards and become the number one haircare brand globally on TikTok.

articles.title: Targeting students, Nubia V70 Series Launching in Indonesia
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nubia launched the V70 Series smartphones in Indonesia, targeting students with enhanced learning and entertainment features. The series includes the Nubia V70 and Nubia V70 Design models, featuring powerful hardware, AI-integrated camera features (like AI Optical Character Recognition), vibrant HD+ displays with 120Hz refresh rates, and NFC technology. The Nubia V70 is priced at Rp1,799,000.

articles.title: Rabbit's new AI agent can control your Android—But is it practical?
articles.author: Livemint
articles.summary: Rabbit has unveiled a new demonstration of its Android AI agent, capable of performing tasks across different applications like adjusting app notification settings, searching YouTube, transferring ingredients to Google Keep, composing poems via WhatsApp, and downloading games. This builds upon their previous web agent, LAM Playground, and signals continued development in AI-driven automation.

articles.title: 31 Products That Reviewers Say Deserve More Than 5 Stars
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Amazon offers a range of products, including a tightening cream, toilet tank cleaner, hair remover, and cleaning products. These items, which range in price, have received positive reviews for their effectiveness and ease of use. Grampa's Gardenware Co. also provides a weeding tool with positive feedback.

articles.title: Oppo Find N5 unboxing
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo has launched the Find N5, a new foldable smartphone. This product is expected to set new standards in the foldable smartphone market.

articles.title: Oppo Find N5 charging speed
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo has launched the Find N5, a foldable smartphone. The device aims to establish new standards in the foldable smartphone category.

articles.title: I reviewed the latest kitchen appliances so you don't have to
articles.author: RTÉ Lifestyle
articles.summary: Ninja has introduced the CREAMi Deluxe, an updated version of the CREAMi ice cream maker with expanded capabilities for making sorbet, gelato, and more. SMEG has launched a milk frother known for its hot chocolate capability, offering a premium feel and velvety hot chocolate results when paired with Knoops Hot Chocolate flakes.

articles.title: The big chain surprises: This is the ridiculous amount you'll pay for a giant screen
articles.summary: Shufersal has launched a promotion on Pilot brand televisions, offering discounts for customers who spend 199 shekels in store. The promotion includes discounts on various models, like the 32-inch HD LED screen for NIS 199 and the 55-inch ANDROID QLED 4K screen for NIS 999.

articles.title: DJI's RS4 Mini stabilizer can now track subjects automatically
articles.author: Steve Dent
articles.summary: DJI's RS4 Mini is now available with the RS Intelligent Tracking Module and flagship RS4 gimbal features like auto-axis locks and 4th-gen stabilization. The redesigned RS4 Mini, slightly heavier than the RS3 Mini, maintains a 4.4-pound payload, supporting most mirrorless and lightweight cinema cameras.

articles.title: The best foldable phones for 2025
articles.author: Sam Rutherford
articles.summary: Samsung and Google are key players in the foldable phone market, offering devices with unique features and durability considerations. Samsung phones offer one free screen protector replacement for its foldables. The Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold is mentioned among devices offering IPX8 water resistance.

articles.title: AI tool that can do online shopping for you launches in UK
articles.author: Gianni Marini
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'Operator', a new AI agent for ChatGPT, in the UK. This tool autonomously carries out tasks on the web, such as online shopping and booking services through integrations with platforms like OpenTable and Uber. Currently in 'research preview', Operator is available for ChatGPT's pro subscribers.

articles.title: Oppo Watch X2 Announced as a Rebranded OnePlus Watch 3
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo launched the Oppo Watch X2, a premium smartwatch with a 1.5-inch LTPO AMOLED display, Snapdragon W5 chipset, and dual OS (WearOS 5 and RTOS) for enhanced battery life. Available in Lava Black (SGD 499) and Summit Blue (SGD 549) in Singapore, global availability is expected soon.

articles.title: Google Rolls Out Circle To Search-Like Feature For iPhone: How To Use
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Google is rolling out the "Search Screen with Google Lens" feature for Apple iPhones, a service that allows users to search for anything on their screen with a simple gesture within Chrome and the Google app. This new feature, which is similar to "Circle to Search" on Android but with limited capabilities, is currently being rolled out to English language users and locations where AI Overviews are available.

articles.title: OPPO launches Find N5: World's thinnest book-style foldable with unprecedented design, battery life, AI-powered performance
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: OPPO has announced the global availability of its Find N5 flagship foldable smartphone. The Find N5 features a thin and light design and the largest inner screen of any book-style foldable.

articles.title: We Will Be Building AI From India: Meltwater's Aditya Jami
articles.author: Harichandan Arakali
articles.summary: Meltwater is enhancing its platform and product suites by developing AI agents for goal-oriented tasks. Meltwater has partnered with Microsoft to integrate its data with the Microsoft Copilot ecosystem, aiming to transform user experience and strategic impact.

articles.title: Maextro aims to be new maestro
articles.author: China.dot.org
articles.summary: Huawei previewed new technologies for the Maextro S800 flagship sedan, priced over 1 million yuan. This showcases Huawei's ambition to establish a new standard in the luxury sedan market with the Maextro brand.

articles.title: Sempe, Bam III: Two made in Nigerian smartphones threaten global brands
articles.author: Vanguard
articles.summary: Sempe and Bam III, two new smartphones manufactured in Nigeria, have been introduced to the mobile market. These Nigerian-made phones are intended to compete with global smartphone brands.

articles.title: Six Singaporean brands to make Jakarta debut at Nova Now
articles.author: The Jakarta Post
articles.summary: Louken, a Singaporean venture-building company, is launching Nova Now in Jakarta. Nova Now is a pop-up gallery that will showcase six Singaporean lifestyle brands.

articles.title: 'Husband looks forward to getting into bed' thanks to £30 mattress topper
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Linens World Mattress Topper is available on Amazon for £28.30 (double size) and eBay for £58.48, praised by shoppers for improved sleep. Ezysleep 4 Inch Thick Super Soft Mattress Topper is available at Debenhams for £29.83, and Gel Fusion Mattress Topper is available at Dunelm for £135.

articles.title: BYD's Fangchengbao launches plug-in hybrid with advanced autonomous driving features
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: BYD's off-road brand Fangchengbao launched smart versions of its plug-in hybrid SUV Bao 5. The Bao 5 includes BYD's "God's Eye" advanced driver-assistance system and is priced from 239,800 yuan. Another version features Huawei's Qiankun ADAS and starts at 284,800 yuan.

articles.title: Nvidia Introducing AI Platform ‘Signs' to Simplify Learning American Sign Language
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched "Signs," a language learning platform for American Sign Language (ASL), in partnership with the American Society for Deaf Children. The platform utilizes a 3-D avatar and AI feedback to teach users ASL, initially featuring 100 distinct signs with plans to expand to 1,000. Signs is free to use and aims to foster practical AI applications beyond corporate customers, contributing videos of signs that are not already available on the platform to grow its vocabulary.

articles.title: Elizabeth Arden set with perfume, lotion and shower gel now under £40
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Amazon has discounted the Elizabeth Arden RED DOOR set. The set includes a perfume, body lotion, and shower gel. Additionally, The Body Shop offers the Nourish & Flourish British Rose Ultimate Gift set, and Next has the Eau Nude Perfume Duo and 200ml Body Wash Gift Set available.

articles.title: McDonald's Singapore Launching Curry McNuggets, Brings Back Nasi Lemak Burger
articles.author: George Yang
articles.summary: McDonald's Singapore is launching Curry Chicken McNuggets on February 24, 2025, featuring a spicy curry marinade. The Nasi Lemak Burger, combining a coconut-flavored chicken patty with traditional flavors, is also returning. The Coke Float, a vanilla soft serve and Coca-Cola pairing, will also be available.

articles.title: Astros Spring Training Interviews: Zach Dezenzo and Joe Espada
articles.summary: KENS 5 launched its streaming service on phones. Users can access the service through the KENS 5 app.

articles.title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Laser Photonics and Fonon Technologies Partnership with NOBLE Delivers TAA-Compliant Laser Solutions, Transforming Marine Base Readiness
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: {2D6C !9@E@?:4D offers }~q{t which provides mission-critical support with world-class resources and logistics, offering solutions for customers with aerospace, logistics, defense and other commercial requirements, enabling customers to rapidly respond to today's challenges and incorporate sustainable solutions. }~q{t addresses the need for readiness while maximizing equipment utilization and increasing infrastructure resilience.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 7 Performance 2025 review: snapshot
articles.author: Andrew Chesterton
articles.summary: BYD is launching the Sealion 7, a mid-size electric SUV, with a twin-motor, AWD setup producing 390kW and 690Nm. The Performance model accelerates to 100km/h in 4.5 seconds and is priced at $63,990. Both Sealion 7 models share an 82.56kWh battery, with the Premium model offering a 456km range.

articles.title: McDonald's S'pore bringing back Nasi Lemak Burger on Feb. 24, 2025
articles.author: Charlize Kon
articles.summary: McDonald's Singapore is reintroducing the Nasi Lemak Burger and launching a new Coke Float drink along with new Curry Chicken McNuggets on Feb. 24. The Nasi Lemak Burger features a fried chicken patty, fried egg, caramelized onions, cucumber slices, and spicy sambal sauce, priced from S$9.75 with an Extra Value Meal. The new Coke Float combines Coke with vanilla Sundae Ice Cream, priced from S$4.50.

articles.title: DeepSeek helps Yiwu merchants master cross-border e-commerce trade
org: Yiwu China Commodity City Big Data Company
articles.summary: The Chinagoods AI platform integrated DeepSeek AI models and launched XiaoShang AI Video Creator. The XiaoShang AI tool allows merchants to generate product introduction videos in multiple languages. DeepSeek models will be connected to more tools, improving the speed and quality of tasks such as copywriting, video generation, image design, and multilingual communication.

articles.title: McDonald's S'pore selling Curry Chicken McNuggets from Feb. 24, 2025
articles.author: Megan Michael
articles.summary: McDonald's Singapore is launching a new McNuggets flavor, curry chicken, which will be available from Feb. 24, 2025. The new McNuggets cost S$8.70 onwards with an Extra Value Meal and are available in either six, nine or 20-piece portions.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz Shares Major Plans: Baby G, CLA Concept and New V8 Engine
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz is developing a smaller, more accessible G-Class, nicknamed 'Baby G'. The company will also launch the all-new CLA, offered in electric and ICE variants, and Mercedes-AMG is developing a new high-tech, electrified V8 engine. Furthermore, Mercedes-Benz plans to roll out its proprietary MB.OS software.

articles.title: 2025 Mercedes-Benz C200: Entry-level luxury sedan gets price cut
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering deals on hundreds of new cars, inviting customers to leverage their expertise for advantageous purchases. Customers are invited to browse for the offering.

articles.title: Kia PV5: Electric people mover and van revealed, cab-chassis spied
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: Kia is preparing to launch its first line of electric commercial vehicles. The company previewed the exterior design of its new PV5 van and people mover, and spy shots of the cab-chassis version have emerged.

articles.title: Evolution Fresh Expands Real Fruit Soda Distribution at Whole Foods Market Stores Nationwide
articles.author: Vegworld Magazine
articles.summary: Evolution Fresh has expanded the distribution of its Real Fruit Soda to Whole Foods Market locations nationwide. The soda, made with organic fruit juice, comes in Tropical Mango, Strawberry Vanilla, Lemon Lime, and Orange Squeeze flavors. It contains zero added sugar, 45 calories, and includes prebiotic fiber, probiotics and antioxidant Vitamin C.

articles.title: Jay Ambe Property Solutions Opens Premium Sindhu Bhavan Branch Integrating AI for Better Client Experience
articles.summary: Jay Ambe Property Solutions (JAPS) inaugurated a new high-end experience branch in Ahmedabad and is implementing AI-driven client profiling. This new service aims to streamline the property search process for potential buyers by matching them with suitable properties based on their preferences and needs.

articles.title: 농심, 칼로리 줄인 ‘누들핏 튀김우동맛' 출시
articles.summary: Nongshim is launching a new product called 'Noodle Fit Fried Udon Flavor' on the 24th. This new product combines the unique broth flavor of Nongshim Fried Udon with the low-calorie benefits of Noodle Fit, containing 130kcal and 1500mg of dietary fiber. Nongshim plans to expand consumer choices and continue brand growth by releasing new products with various concepts.

articles.title: Boost your driving experience with Honda Elevate
articles.author: Daily Trust
articles.summary: Honda launched the All-New Honda Elevate SUV in India and South Africa. The vehicle aims to elevate the driving experience and sets a new standard.

articles.title: My startup journey with BYBE
articles.summary: BYBE is a startup that aimed to revolutionize a specific use case in the alcohol industry by addressing the complexities of regulations governing how alcohol products are marketed and sold. The company's idea originated from observations about the absence of alcohol brands in retail loyalty programs and mobile apps, driving them to explore innovative solutions within the regulatory framework.

articles.title: Temperatures expected to climb
articles.author: Nbsp
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services, in partnership with Jonathan Alder Local Schools, has launched the Amazon Think Big Space. This initiative aims to foster creativity, problem-solving, and technical skills through hands-on learning in areas such as design, coding, robotics, AI, and cloud computing.

articles.title: ChatGPT is going to be less constrained on sensitive topics, according to OpenAI
articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz
articles.summary: Rabbit is launching an Android app that acts as an AI agent, capable of automating tasks across different apps based on user prompts. Unlike typical AI chatbots, Rabbit's agent coordinates tasks like writing invitations, picking recipes, or assembling grocery lists. The app will be available on the Play Store, allowing users to link it to Android apps and prompt the AI to complete tasks in the background.

articles.title: Buyer's guide: New smartphones, gadgets from January, February 2025
articles.author: Angelo Gonzales
articles.summary: Several companies have recently launched new products. POCO released the X7 and X7 Pro smartphones. HONOR introduced the X9c 5G emphasizing its durability. OnePlus launched the 13 and 13R smartphones. Redmi introduced the Note 14 series smartphones. Lenovo has released the Legion Go S handheld gaming device. Samsung announced the Galaxy S25 series. Huawei launched the Nova 13 series. OPPO introduced the Reno 13 series. ASUS announced its 2025 Zenbook laptops. Apple is expected to launch the iPhone 16e.

articles.title: Roborock Unveils Advanced Robot Vacuum Cleaners in South Korea
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: Roborock launched its new flagship robot vacuum cleaners, the S9 MaxV Ultra and S9 MaxV Slim, at its 2025 launch event. The S9 MaxV Ultra boasts Korea's highest suction power at 22,000 Pa, while the S9 MaxV Slim introduces Roborock's first AI-based navigation system. Roborock also introduced its new F25 series of cordless wet-dry vacuum cleaners.

articles.title: Order your new Samsung Galaxy S25 device and get up to $1,200 in savings
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Galaxy S25 series, including the Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra. The new smartphones feature enhanced cameras, long battery life, and AI integration. Customers can receive up to $300 in Samsung Credits and up to $900 in trade-in value.

articles.title: Order your new Samsung Galaxy S25 device and get up to $1,200 in savings
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Galaxy S25 lineup, including the S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra models, featuring a new processor, AI integration, and enhanced camera capabilities. The devices are available for order with deliveries starting in late February, and customers can receive up to $1,200 in savings through trade-in credits and Samsung Credits.

articles.title: DJI delivers next-level intelligent smartphone photography with Osmo Mobile 7 series
articles.summary: DJI has launched the Osmo Mobile 7P and Osmo Mobile 7, new phone gimbals featuring seventh-generation stabilization and ActiveTrack 7.0 technology. The Osmo Mobile 7P includes a Multifunctional Module for subject tracking and integrated light control, while the Osmo Mobile 7 is the lighter, more entry-level gimbal in the series. Both are now available at DJI authorized retail stores and online.

articles.title: Chinese smartphone firm Oppo launches slim $1,870 folding phone to rival Samsung, Huawei
articles.author: Ryan Browne
articles.summary: Oppo has unveiled its new flagship folding phone, the Find N5, featuring a slimmer body and AI-focused features. The Find N5 will retail starting at 2,499 Singapore dollars.

articles.title: An elite N.J. bagel shop is opening a new location. Here's what we know.
articles.author: Christopher Burch
articles.summary: O'Bagel, a breakfast eatery known for its bagels, announced plans to open a new location in Montclair, New Jersey. The shop's menu features classic and specialty bagels, egg and cheese sandwiches, and over-the-top sandwiches. An official opening date has not yet been announced but is expected to be soon.

articles.title: An elite N.J. bagel shop is opening a new location. Here's what we know.
articles.author: Christopher Burch
articles.summary: O'Bagel, a breakfast eatery, announced plans to open a sixth location in Montclair, New Jersey. The opening date is yet to be announced, but the company has teased its arrival on Instagram. The eatery is known for its bagels, egg and cheese sandwiches, breakfast burritos, lunch options, and a jumbo bagel.

articles.title: Car wash adds second Killeen location
articles.author: Joseph Bahr
articles.summary: Tommy's Express Car Wash launched a new location in Killeen with a grand opening event. The event included a ribbon-cutting ceremony, presentations, and networking opportunities for attendees at the new location at 2608 Trimmier Road.

articles.title: Mr. Burger opens third outlet in Wattala, expanding reach in Colombo's suburbs
articles.summary: Mr. Burger, a Sri Lankan fast-food brand, has opened a new outlet in Wattala. This marks the brand's third location since its launch in 2017 and expands its presence in the Colombo suburbs. The new branch offers the full Mr. Burger menu, including signature burgers like the Chicken Pounder and Monster Chicken.

articles.title: Who's taking your order at Wendy's? Fast food chain plans AI drive-thru order rollout
articles.author: Battle Creek Enquirer
articles.summary: Subway and McDonald's are debuting new value menus. Wendy's is preparing to expand the use of FreshAI for drive-thru AI order taking.

articles.title: New Midnight Black Collection of PS5 Accessories Buying Guide
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Sony released its Midnight Black PlayStation accessories today. These accessories provide PS5 owners with options for customizing their consoles.

articles.title: BMW's 800V 'Neue Klasse' EV platform to charge 30% faster
articles.author: Driving
articles.summary: BMW's upcoming 'Neue Klasse' EV platform, utilizing sixth-gen BMW eDrive tech, will feature a 30% faster charging capability. The platform may also offer battery ranges exceeding 800 km.

articles.title: Zickuhr Roll Off Container Disposal Service. United States,Iowa, Bettendorf, Waste Management Company
articles.author: Scrap Monster
articles.summary: Zickuhr provides Roll Off Container Disposal Service.

articles.title: Mobile phone users never have to do the weekly shop, call an Uber or book ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: OpenAI has released 'Operator,' a new AI tool in the UK designed to automate online shopping and bookings for users. This autonomous tool can fulfill tasks like completing a weekly shopping list.

articles.title: Dyson vacuum under $300: Target cuts prices on top-selling Dyson V8 cordless vacuum
articles.author: The Oregonian
articles.summary: Target is offering the Dyson V8 Origin cordless vacuum for $299.99, a $130 discount from its regular price of $429.99. The Dyson V8 Origin cordless vacuum is designed for versatility, offering up to 40.

articles.title: Thesisx-Backed Fold Becomes First Bitcoin Financial Services Company to Go Public on Nasdaq
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: Thesis is pioneering Bitcoin-native financial innovation. Thesis aims to provide access to crypto products to average consumers.

articles.title: Thesis*-Backed Fold Becomes First Bitcoin Financial Services Company to Go Public on Nasdaq
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Thesis, a venture studio, is pioneering Bitcoin-native financial innovation. The company aims to provide average consumers access to crypto products. Fold's milestone validates Thesis' commitment to developing Bitcoin-native financial tools.
